member.name: T:CompuMaster.Calendar.DateInformation.WeekNumber
member.summary: A data structure for a complete week number inclusive the year information which is related to a pure week number

member.name: M:CompuMaster.Calendar.DateInformation.WeekOfYear(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Lookup the calendar week of the year based on the current culture set
member.param: A date value whose week number is required

member.name: M:CompuMaster.Calendar.DateInformation.WeekOfYear(System.DateTime,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Lookup the calendar week of the year based on the current culture set
member.param: A date value whose week number is required
The culture information which shall be the base of all date calculations

member.name: M:CompuMaster.Calendar.DateInformation.FirstDateOfWeek(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Lookup the first date of a week
member.param: The year
The week
member.returns: The date of the first day of the week

member.name: M:CompuMaster.Calendar.DateInformation.FirstDateOfWeek(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Lookup the first date of a week
member.param: The year
The week
The culture information which shall be the base of all date calculations
member.returns: The date of the first day of the week

member.name: M:CompuMaster.Calendar.DateInformation.LastDateOfWeek(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Lookup the last date of a week
member.param: The year
The week
member.returns: The date of the last day of the week on 0 o'clock (not 24 o'clock!)

member.name: M:CompuMaster.Calendar.DateInformation.LastDateOfWeek(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Lookup the last date of a week
member.param: The year
The week
The culture information which shall be the base of all date calculations
member.returns: The date of the last day of the week on 0 o'clock (not 24 o'clock!)

member.name: M:CompuMaster.Calendar.WorkDays.CountTypicalWorkDays(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Count the number of weekdays Monday to Friday, also known as workdays
member.param: The begin of the period
The last inclusive day of the period

member.name: M:CompuMaster.Calendar.WorkDays.CountTypicalFreeDays(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Count the number of weekdays Saturday to Sunday, also known as free days
member.param: The begin of the period
The last inclusive day of the period
